wm-license-gfdl-1.2-and-later: An bada damar a kofa, a yaɗa/ko sauya wannan kundi ƙarƙashin '''[[{{int:wm-license-gfdl-wiki-link}}|Lasisin GNU ta kyauta]]''', Fitarwa na 1.2 ko duk wani fitarwa da zai biyo baya daga [[{{int:wm-license-fsf-wiki-link}}|Gidauniyar Samar da Software ta Kyauta]]; ba tare da sauyin sashe ba, babu Rubutun Fuskar gaban shafi, kuma babu Rubutun bayan shafi. Kofi na lasisin na nan an sanya sa aciki ƙarƙashin sashen ''[[{{int:wm-license-gfdl-full-1.2-link}}|GNU Free Documentation License]]''.
wm-license-self-multiple-licenses-select: Ku na iya zaɓan lasisin da kuke so.
